person.persName: Jacob C. Hess (Dover, Mason County police judge and postmaster )

body.p: Residence: Dover, Mason County, Kentucky. Born in Virginia. Occupation: wharf boat and livery. Police Judge of Dover. Appointed postmaster of Dover on 10 Sep 1864.
